column4: Does the "Raising Skinny Elephants Is Utterly Boring" trick still work in Ubuntu 8.10?
it should :P
because I tried to use it a couple of minutes ago, and it didn't work.. -_-
ok, wierd, ctrl+alt+sysrq+b should definatly reboot your system, rseiub is just the best way to siconnect all services and stuff iirc
I'm trying it right now, it doesn't work.. That's very weird..
I'm not going to try it ;)
but it's very oldskool, maybe the kernel-devs removed it
Lol, I didn't say you will. :D
Yeah, it's an old trick, but sometimes it's your last resort, I mean, sometimes you just need it.
yup, strange that it doesn't work for you
lemme try it for funs ;) I'm running Kubuntu 8.04 btw

I'm trying to play an on-line game called "second life", and this game just keeps strangling my entire system the moment I start controlling my character in it, I try to Raise The Elephants and it just doesn't work..
worked btw ;)
ctrl+alt+sysrq+<r,s,e,i,u,b>
Nope, nothing happens...
what system are you running?
Ubuntu 8.10
ok, I'm on 8.04 .. so things might have changed
that's possible.
Maybe it still works the same way as before, but with a bit different key combination.
mhmm.
